name: Webuzz Limited
overview:
WeBuzz, a leading social marketing apps provider with 16 ready-to-use applications in 22 languages, powers over 100,000 Pages to attract fans on social media networks.

Since 2010, WeBuzz has become a leading social marketing apps provider, especially in Asian market. Providing 16 kinds of ready-to-use Facebook Page applications in 22 languages for over 100,000 Pages worldwide, the total number of users has reached more than 110,000. We support over 200,000 applications with a wide range of social media functions. Our technology and fans engagement applications allow brands to launch interactive marketing campaigns on social media networks and enrich their Facebook Page content to attract more fans effortlessly. WeBuzz pioneers a multi-language interface for editing applications and extra user care services including instant message support for all kinds of WeBuzz users to manage or customize application content on our dashboard easily. WeBuzz is trusted by international iconic brands such as Adidas Cricket, Mazda, shu uemura, Rakuten Ichiba and a number of media coverages on various prestigious websites and blogs. WeBuzz has also been adopted by Amazon as a case study for Cloud Computing platform. To learn more, please visit www.webuzzapp.com
